title: Duster Episode 4 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch
description: The Duster Episode 4 release date and time are right around the corner. The previous episode, titled “You’re No Good,” showcased Awan and Nina searching for a former agent. Further, Jim came across evidence that ended up confirming Nina’s doubts regarding Saxton. The upcoming episode is expected to feature a series of entertaining twists and […] The post Duster Episode 4 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ritika Singh
excerpt: Curious to know the Duster Episode 4 release date and time? Here is everything you need to know abbout it.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The Duster Episode 4 release date and time are right around the corner. The previous episode, titled “You’re No Good,” showcased Awan and Nina searching for a former agent. Further, Jim came across evidence that ended up confirming Nina’s doubts regarding Saxton. The upcoming episode is expected to feature a series of entertaining twists and turns. Check out all the information about the release date of Duster’s upcoming episode, including how you can stream it online. When is the Duster Episode 4 release date & time? The episode’s release date is June 5, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET in the U.S. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeJune 5, 2025 9 PMPacific TimeJune 5, 2025 6 PM Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in the crime drama series right here. Where to watch Duster Episode 4 You can watch Duster Episode 4 via HBO Max. HBO Max is known for offering a vast library of content from HBO, Warner Bros., DC, Cartoon Network, and more. It features acclaimed series like Succession, Euphoria, and Game of Thrones, along with exclusive films. All the episodes of Duster are available on the streaming platform for subscribers. This is because HBO Max does not offer any initial free trials for users like some other streaming platforms. What is Duster about? Duster chronicles the rollercoaster adventures of the FBI’s Black agent, Nina, and a getaway driver, Jim, coming together to expose a gang of criminals. The official synopsis for Duster is as follows: “In 1972, the first Black female FBI agent heads to the Southwest and recruits a gutsy getaway driver in a bold effort to take down a growing crime syndicate.”
html:
The Duster Episode 4 release date and time are right around the corner. The previous episode, titled “You’re No Good,” showcased Awan and Nina searching for a former agent. Further, Jim came across evidence that ended up confirming Nina’s doubts regarding Saxton. The upcoming episode is expected to feature a series of entertaining twists and turns.

Check out all the information about the release date of Duster’s upcoming episode, including how you can stream it online.

When is the Duster Episode 4 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is June 5, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET in the U.S.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in the crime drama series right here.

Where to watch Duster Episode 4

You can watch Duster Episode 4 via HBO Max.

HBO Max is known for offering a vast library of content from HBO, Warner Bros., DC, Cartoon Network, and more. It features acclaimed series like Succession, Euphoria, and Game of Thrones, along with exclusive films. All the episodes of Duster are available on the streaming platform for subscribers. This is because HBO Max does not offer any initial free trials for users like some other streaming platforms.

What is Duster about?

Duster chronicles the rollercoaster adventures of the FBI’s Black agent, Nina, and a getaway driver, Jim, coming together to expose a gang of criminals.

The official synopsis for Duster is as follows:

“In 1972, the first Black female FBI agent heads to the Southwest and recruits a gutsy getaway driver in a bold effort to take down a growing crime syndicate.”
